short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the competitive edge in Draft Fantasy Premier League (FPL) by overlaying Rotowire rankings on the official FPL website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension helps Draft Fantasy Premier League players pick teams easily by overlaying weekly rankings and forecasts in the official FPL website. Stay one step ahead of your opponents using this extension!
